PartialVolume/shredos.x86_64

Erases disks on computers via USB

Related repos

  • Removes macOS applications and related files
  • Boot sector OS with shell, file system, process management, x86 assembly, SDK
  • recover deleted or overwritten files from Linux partitions using a terminal UI
  • forensic disk analysis and file recovery tool with CLI and desktop app
  • Collection of tools for a multiboot USB drive
  • Creates bootable macOS USB drives on Apple Silicon
  • Parallel disk analyzer that maxes out your SSD and lets you interactively delete files
  • Terminal disk space navigator
